subject: CS
title: Database Systems Implementation
description: The objective of this course is to introduce students to fundamentals of building a relational database management system. The course focuses on the database engine core technology by studying topics such as storage management (data layout, disk-based data structures), indexing, query processing algorithms, query optimization, transactional concurrency control, logging and recovery. [Note: Lab is not scheduled and students are expected to find time in open hours to complete their work. Offered: W]
